definition: used as intensifiers, quick and energetic, a rapid series of short loud sounds (as might be heard with a stethoscope in some types of respiratory disorders)
details:
adverb
- used as intensifiers
= synonyms: very
adjective
- quick and energetic
= synonyms: brisk, alert, lively, zippy, merry, snappy, spanking
- extraordinarily good or great
= synonyms: wondrous
noun
- a rapid series of short loud sounds (as might be heard with a stethoscope in some types of respiratory disorders)
= synonyms: rattle
